By taking on this role, the parents have to be aware of the responsibility that by introducing new foods to the baby's diet they are not merely putting food into their child's tummy, but also instilling lifelong attitudes towards food and nutrition!<br><br>For this reason it is good to follow the basic principles of complementary feeding, which is why the baby food chart has been made - to help the parents. The baby food chart serves to inform the parents and does not need to be strictly adhered to. Это ваш домашний логопед и инструмент для работы. На примере веселых игр вы сможете объяснить, что в слове ""бабочка"" нет звука -л, а в ""белка"" - есть; что в слове ""лук"" он стоит в начале, а в ""колбаса"" в середине слова.<br><br>Хотели бы обратить ваше внимание на несколько нюансов.<br>Скороговорки НЕ могут исправить дефект произношения. Они служат для тренировки правильного произношения ЧИСТОГО звука. Если же звук произносится неправильно, то скороговорками дефект только закрепляется.<br>Когда ребенок не произносит звук, мы его ведем к логопеду? - Не к диктору и не на курсы актерского мастерства? <br>Такая же ситуация и с обучающими приложениями. ;))<br><br>В данных логопедических занятиях используется классическая методика, она одинакова для коррекции ротацизма у детей и взрослых. These Steps Restrict Which Device Can Access Your Device<br><br><b>How Secured Is ScreenSpie?</b><br>The App Communicate With Server On SSL To Establish A Direct Encrypted Connection Between Devices If Possible. If It Can Not Create A Direct Connection Due To Network Issues, It Establishes An End-To-End Connection Through Secured Server.<br><br>Please Note That ScreenSpie Uses Your 3g/4g Internet Connection. Carrier Charges Will Apply.<br><br><b>Facing Connectivity Issue ?</b><br>1. If Name Your Are Trying To Set Shows ""Already Taken May Be"", Try In A Few Seconds Again. Happens When You Re-Install The App And Try To Set Previous Name Again.<br>2. Check Device Name You Are Trying To Connect. Names Are Unique To Each Device And Case-Sensitive (Meaning Small And Capital Letters Are Not Same).<br>3. It Only Connects When Your Device Name Exists In Other Mobile Device List. For Security Reasons.<br>4. If You Are Using Any VPN Service, It Won't Work.<br>5. Most Important - Make Sure Other Device Is Connected To Internet.<br><br><b>Important Note</b><br>For Security Reasons, You Must Add Your Device Name To Other Device In Order To Connect.<br><b>Why Do We Do This?</b><br>If We Allow Devices To Connect By Just Giving It A Name, Anybody Could Connect To That Device If Name Is Known Or Just By Making A Correct Guess <br>But Adding Names Of Other Devices Which Can Connect To That Device Makes It Impossible To Access That Device, Unless You Have Access To That Device Physically.<br><br><b>For Any Improvement Suggestions, Please Email Us With Exact Requirements</b></div>"	"0.00"	"Parenting"	"9"

The weeks are grouped into three trimester.<br>Find out what’s happening with you and your baby in these three stages by using Pregnancy Baby Care For Safe Delivery app.<br><br>Pregnancy Baby Care For Safe Delivery Helps In 1st trimester (week 1 – week 12):<br><br>During the first trimester your body undergoes many changes. Hormonal changes affect almost every organ system in your body. These changes can trigger symptoms even in the very first weeks of pregnancy. Your period stopping is a clear sign that you are pregnant.<br><br>• Extreme tiredness<br>• Headache<br>• Heartburn<br>• Weight gain or loss<br><br>Pregnancy Baby Care For Safe Delivery Helps In 2nd trimester (week 13 – week 28):<br><br>Most women find the second trimester of pregnancy easier than the first. But it is just as important to stay informed about your pregnancy during these months.<br>As your body changes to make room for your growing baby, you may have:<br><br>• Body aches, such as back, abdomen, groin, or thigh pain.<br>• Stretch marks on your abdomen, breasts, thighs, or buttocks.<br>• Darkening of the skin around your nipples.<br><br>Pregnancy Baby Care For Safe Delivery Helps In 3rd trimester (week 29 – week 40):<br><br>You’re in the home stretch! Some of the same discomforts you had in your second trimester will continue. Plus, many women find breathing difficult and notice they have to go to the bathroom even more often. This is because the baby is getting bigger and it is putting more pressure on your organs. Don’t worry, your baby is fine and these problems will lessen once you give birth.<br><br>Some new body changes you might notice in the 3rd trimester include:<br>• Shortness of breath<br>• Heartburn<br>• Trouble sleeping<br>• The baby “dropping”, or moving lower in your abdomen<br><br>Pregnancy Baby Care For Safe Delivery helps what kind of food you should eat and what not to eat during pregnancy:<br><br>• What To Eat - Fruits and Vegetables, Lean protein, Whole grains, Dairy.<br>• What Not To Eat - Alcohol, Fish with high levels of mercury, Unpasteurised food, Raw meat.<br><br>Pregnancy Baby Care For Safe Delivery guides you to do safe exercises during pregnancy<br><br>1. Sie lernen, welche Voraussetzungen Ihr Kind für einen Entwicklungsschritt mitbringen muss und erhalten nützliche Tipps zur Förderung der Fortschritte.<br>Halten Sie die schönsten Momente in der Entwicklung Ihres Kindes fest, wo auch immer Sie gerade sind. "com.alp.pregnancyweekbyweek"	"Pregnancy Week by Week"	"100"	"0"	"<div jsname=""sngebd"">Looking for a week-by-week guide to pregnancy? You're in luck! We've got loads of expert-approved info about each week and trimester, including what's up with your growing baby and what changes to expect for yourself.<br><br>You'll find stunning fetal development videos, thousands of articles, and helpful tools like our Due Date Calculator and Baby Names Finder. Meet other parents-to-be in our online community, and get all of this and more in our free pregnancy app. Dive in, and congratulations!<br><br>What is the pregnancy period?<br>The unborn baby spends around 38 weeks in the uterus, but the average length of pregnancy, or gestation, is counted at 40 weeks. Pregnancy is counted from the first day of the woman's last period, not the date of conception which generally occurs two weeks later.<br><br>What are the symptoms of a man when a woman is pregnant?<br>Men 'suffer sympathy pains during pregnancy' Men really do suffer pregnancy symptoms in sympathy with their partners, a study has shown. Fathers-to-be endure cramps, back pain, mood swings, food cravings, morning sickness, extreme tiredness, depression, irritability, fainting and toothache, researchers found.<br><br>What is the first stage of pregnancy?<br>Most pregnancy tests will be positive by the time you've missed your period. Other early pregnancy symptoms include feeling tired, feeling bloated, peeing more than usual, mood swings, nausea, and tender or swollen breasts. Not everyone has all of these symptoms, but it's common to have at least 1 of them.<br><br>What are the signs of pregnancy in the first week?<br>Many early pregnancy symptoms can appear similar to routine pre-menstrual discomforts.<br>Tender, swollen breasts. Your breasts may provide one of the first symptoms of pregnancy.<br>Fatigue.<br>Slight bleeding or cramping.<br>Nausea with or without vomiting.<br>Food aversions or cravings.<br>Headaches.<br>Constipation.<br>Mood swings.<br><br>What is the longest time a woman has been pregnant?<br>When she delivered a daughter, Penny Diana Hunter, in 1945, the child appeared absolutely normal. This shocked her doctor, who stated that Hunter's last menstrual period had been a staggering 375 days ago. An average pregnancy is 280 days, making this an extra three months that Hunter carried her daughter in the womb.<br><br>Can you get your period and still be pregnant?<br>You can't have your menstrual period while you're pregnant. Some women do have vaginal bleeding during pregnancy. Some even report intermittent bleeding that seems like a regular period to them. But vaginal bleeding during pregnancy is not the same thing as menstruation.<br><br>Can a man have symptoms if his girlfriend is pregnant?<br>It's like they're flipping us the flightless bird. Allow me to set the record straight: Guys can have pregnancy symptoms, and there's even a clinical term for it. Couvade syndrome is a condition where the father-to-be experiences pregnancy symptoms like weight gain, nausea, insomnia and mood swings.<br><br>How can you tell if a girl is pregnant?<br>The most common early signs and symptoms of pregnancy might include:<br>Missed period. If you're in your childbearing years and a week or more has passed without the start of an expected menstrual cycle, you might be pregnant<br>Tender, swollen breasts<br>Nausea with or without vomiting<br>Increased urination<br>Fatigue.<br><br>What is the first sign of pregnancy?<br>This can cause one of the earliest signs of pregnancy -- spotting and, sometimes, cramping. That's called implantation bleeding. It occurs anywhere from six to 12 days after the egg is fertilized. The cramps resemble menstrual cramps, so some women mistake them and the bleeding for the start of their period<br><br>What week do pregnancy symptoms start?<br>Pregnancy symptoms at 4 weeks. Normally you get your period about 4 weeks from the start of your last period, but if you're pregnant, the clearest sign at this point is a missed period. Many women still feel fine at 4 weeks, but others may notice sore breasts, fatigue, frequent urination, and nausea</div>"	"0.00"	"Parenting"	"0"

Packed with adventure and Jungle Law wisdom, this book has pervaded popular culture as the basis of many film and stage adaptations, including the popular Disney movie.<br><br>The Little Mermaid is a very well known fairy tale by the Danish author Hans Christian Andersen about a young mermaid willing to give up her life in the sea and her identity as a mermaid to gain a human soul and the love of a human prince. The tale was first published in 1837 and has been adapted to various media including musical theatre and animated film. But this tale is not the Disney version, all cleaned up and made pretty. This is the way Andersen wrote it. The Little Mermaid is indeed at the happy wedding of her beloved prince, but she is not the bride. And then she becomes a big bubble. Curious? Listen and find out what happens.<br><br>When Captain Carey went on his long journey into the unknown and uncharted land, the rest of the Careys tried in vain for a few months to be still a family, and did not succeed at all. They clung as closely to one another as ever they could, but there was always a gap in the circle where father had been….. The only thing to do was to remember father's pride and justify it, to recall his care for mother and take his place so far as might be; the only thing for all, as the months went on, was to be what mother called the three Bs -- brave, bright, and busy."" From the author of Rebecca of Sunnybrook Farm, this book tells the story of a widow and her four children, forced to leave their home due to financial difficulties, and move to the “Yellow House” in turn of the century Beulah, Maine. The Disney movie “Summer Magic” starring Hayley Mills was loosely based on this book. <br><br>Tarzan of the Apes is Burroughs’ exciting, if improbable, story of an English lord, left by the death of his stranded parents in the hands of a motherly African ape who raises him as her own. Although he is aware that he is different from the apes of his tribe, who are neither white nor hairless, he nevertheless regards them as his “people.” When older, larger, stronger apes decide that he an undesirable to be killed or expelled from the tribe, it is fortunate that Tarzan has learned the use of primitive weapons. Although small and weak by ape standards, Tarzan is a human of god-like strength and agility to men who discover him. By studying these people, he gradually decides he is not an ape at all, but human. And when he meets Jane, a beautiful American girl marooned with her father and friends on the hostile coast of Africa, Tarzan conceives love for her. When they are unexpectedly rescued before Tarzan can find a way to reveal his feelings to Jane, he determines to become civilized and follow her into the world of people – to find her and wed her, though he must cross continents and oceans, and compete with two other suitors for her hand.</div>"	"0.00"	"Parenting"	"3"

Límites y reglas que buscan el correcto desarrollo de sus hijos. Pero además, es el padre y la madre , quien hace que los límites sean respetados. Gleichzeitig wird an diese Nummern die metergenaue Position der Uhr übermittelt.<br><br>LOCATE<br>Die ANIO lässt sich dank des eingebauten GPS Senders metergenau orten. Sollte die GPS Funktion wegen Abschattung nicht verfügbar sein wird die Position durch Peilung zu den nächsten Mobilfunkmasten auf einige hundert Meter genau ermittelt.<br><br>SMS<br>Es können SMS-Nachrichten von in der App hinterlegten Telefonnummern empfangen werden.<br><br>VOICE <br>Sprachnachricht können gesendet und empfangen werden.<br><br>GEO FENCE<br>Hierüber lässt sich ein sicherer Bereich für ihr Kind festlegen und sie werden sofort benachrichtigt, falls das Kind diesen festgelegten Radius (z.B. 1000m um das Elternhaus) verlassen sollte.<br><br>HEALTH<br>Kontrolle verschiedener Gesundheits-Parameter (Wegstrecke, Kalorienverbrauch, Schlafrhythmus).<br><br>CLOCK<br>Uhrzeit mit Datum und Wochentag<br><br>ALARM<br>Weckfunktion, Benachrichtigung falls Uhr abgelegt wird.<br><br>NO ABO<br>Um alle Funktionen der ANIO nutzen zu können benötigen Sie nur eine kostenpflichtige Prepaid SIM-Card eines beliebigen Mobilfunk-Anbieters mit Datenvolumen. Es fallen keine weiteren monatlichen Abo- oder Servicekosten durch die ANIO GmbH an!</div>"	"0.00"	"Parenting"	"73"

"com.crmobile.cryitout"	"Cry It Out"	"10"	"3"	"<div jsname=""sngebd"">This app will you as a parent use the Cry it Out method to train your child to fall asleep on their own. It will also track the progress your child is making over time with a graph.<br><br>What is Cry it Out?<br><br>Cry it Out is a sleep training method which includes letting a child cry for a specified period of time before offering comfort. The goal is to help the child learn how to fall asleep on his or her own.<br><br>How to do Cry it Out?<br><br>Put child comfortably in bed and walk out of the room. The room should be quiet or have white noise and the lights should be off.<br>If child cries when you leave the room, let child cry for a specified amount of time. (see ""Suggested Waiting Periods"" below)<br>If child is still crying after specified waiting period, go and offer comfort to the child for about a minute. Then, walk out of the room.<br>Repeat steps 2 and 3, gradually increasing the waiting period, until child falls asleep.<br>If child wakes up again later, follow the same routine. Begin with the minimum waiting period and increase until you've reached the maximum waiting period.<br><br>Suggested Waiting Periods<br><br>1st Night: Wait for 3 minutes the first time, 5 minutes the second time, and 10 minutes the third and subsequent waiting periods.<br>2nd Night: Wait for 5 minutes, then 10 minutes, then 12 minutes.<br>3rd Night and any following Nights: Wait for 10 minutes, then 15 minutes, then 20 minutes.<br><br>How Do I Use This App?<br><br>Select the tab of what day you are on. (It should already default to the current day you are on).<br>Select a time to wait. The recommended waiting period will be the default.<br>Put child to sleep. If child starts crying, click the play button.<br>Wait for time to end. Try to distract yourself so you aren't tempted to go in before the timer goes off. Se il libro descrive in modo approfondito, e con termini di facile comprensione, gli incredibili cambiamenti evolutivi del bambino, l'app è il mezzo perfetto per monitorarne lo sviluppo cognitivo (nei primi 20 mesi di vita). Sapere esattamente cosa sta succedendo al proprio bambino serve per aiutarlo a superare lo scatto più facilmente e stimolarne il suo sviluppo.<br><br>Con l'app “The Wonder Weeks” i neogenitori hanno informazioni su:<br>- quando si verifica lo scatto dello sviluppo cognitivo del proprio bambino<br>- cosa può comprendere e imparare dopo questo scatto di crescita<br>- cosa è in grado di fare dopo questo scatto<br>- cosa si può fare per aiutarlo<br><br>Questa app, inoltre, è un utile promemoria per i neogenitori e indica il momento in cui il bambino sta facendo un significativo progresso nello sviluppo cognitivo. Ad ogni passo in avanti corrisponde un drastico cambiamento del modo in cui il bambino vede il mondo che lo circonda. Poiché questi scatti avanzano rapidamente, il ""nuovo mondo"" e le sue nuove abilità potrebbero spaventarci. Il bambino, infatti, inizialmente, potrà avere difficoltà a dormire, perdere l’appetito o fare capricci, piangere più spesso, essere più irritabile con il risultato che mamma e papà sono esausti e frustrati.<br><br>Dicono gli esperti internazionali di The Wonder Week: ""Questo è uno strumento molto pratico e divertente nel primo anno e mezzo del bambino. Le osservazioni e i suggerimenti pratici degli autori sono meravigliosi. ""-T. Som ett komplement till boken, som med sitt lättfattliga språk går på djupet i sin beskrivning av de otroliga utvecklingsförändringar som din bebis går igenom, är appen med språngkalendern perfekt att ha med sig för att hålla koll på bebisens mentala utveckling (under de första 20 månaderna). Genom att ha reda på vad som händer inuti din bebis' huvud kan du stötta honom så att det blir lättare för honom att ta språnget och stimulera hans utveckling. <br><br>Appen ""Växa och upptäcka världen"" förser nyblivna föräldrar med följande information:  <br>-	Kalender som visar när din bebis är på väg att ta ett språng i sin mentala utveckling <br>-	Om vad din bebis klarar av att förstå och lära sig efter ett visst mentalt språng  <br>-	Om vad din bebis klarar av efter ett visst mentalt språng  <br>-	Om vad du kan göra för att hjälpa din bebis  <br><br>Den här appen kommer också till nytta genom att ge nyblivna föräldrar en påminnelse om när deras bebis' hjärna håller på att förändras, eller ""ta ett språng"". Bebisen gör då betydande framsteg i sin mentala utveckling, och varje steg framåt medför en drastisk förändring i sättet din bebis betraktar sin omvärld. Eftersom sprången dyker upp så snabbt kan den ""nya världen"" och de nya förmågorna ibland verka skrämmande, och utvecklingen kan till en början medföra sömnsvårigheter, dålig aptit, gnällighet, klängighet och grinighet - vilket kan vara mycket tröttsamt och frusterande för mamma och pappa. <br><br>Internationella experter om ""Växa och upptäcka världen"":  ""Detta är ett väldigt praktiskt och underhållande fönster mot bebisens första ett och ett halvt år. van de Rijt och Plooij har observerat och funnit de känsliga och utsatta tidpunkterna i barnets utveckling, vilka jag också har kommit fram till helt oberoende och som återfinns i min bok ""Touchpoints"" (Perseus Books Group). Författarnas observationer och praktiska råd är underbara.""  T. Berry Brazelton, med. dr, professor emeritus, Harvard Medical School   <br><br>""Alla som har med bebisar och småbarn att göra kommer vilja läsa ""Växa och upptäcka världen"". Den här boken kommer vara en ögonöppnare för föräldrar beträffande de aspekter som gäller barnens framsteg, utveckling, förändrade beteenden och känslomässiga reaktioner, vilka de annars kanske inte skulle ha lagt märke till eller skulle ha funnit förbryllande och nedslående.""  Catherine Snow, fil. dr, professor i pedagogik på Shattuck, Harvard Graduate School of Education   <br><br>Friskrivningsklausul: Den här appen har tagits fram med största möjliga omsorg. "com.doublerouble.pol"	"Baby gender planning calendar"	"10000"	"3.9"	"<div jsname=""sngebd"">The baby's gender calendar will help parents plan the desired gender of their future baby. The calculation is based on the date of ovulation and the possibility of conception with X- or Y-spermatozoa. If the X-spermatozoon merges with the egg, a girl will be born, and if the Y-sperm is a boy will be born. Unfortunately, it is impossible to influence this process or completely to foresee it. Our calculator will give an opportunity only to determine approximately the most favorable days for planning the desired gender of the baby. Calendar can not guarantee the birth of a child of a planned sex with 100% probability! If you have an unstable cycle or change the date of ovulation, then the accuracy of calculations decreases. "com.enricoscherlies.kibo"	"Kibo"	"100"	"5"	"<div jsname=""sngebd"">Entspannte Eltern = Entspannte Kinder<br><br>Das ist im Alltag manchmal einfacher gesagt, als getan. Leider funktioniert sie mittels Aushängen, Mails und Telefon eher schlecht. Umgekehrt müssen Kitas bei wichtigen Anlässen z.B. bei Krankheit-Infos oder in Notfällen ganz schnell alle Eltern erreichen; und zwar sofort!<br><br>Deshalb haben wir den Kitaboten entwickelt. Er macht die Kita-Elternkommunikation endlich einfach! Denn er nutzt, was sowieso schon alle haben, den Leitungs-PC und die Smartphones der Eltern. <br><br>Das sagen unsere die Eltern in unseren eigenen Kita über die App:<br>""Die direkte Rückmeldung, dass die Leitung meine Nachricht erhalten hat ist gerade bei Krankmeldungen super.""<br>""Die Rubrik Neuigkeiten finde ich wunderbar, da ich auch oft Dinge am Brett im Eingangsbereich überlese.""<br><br><br>Vereinfachen auch Sie Ihre Kommunikation und testen Sie den Kitaboten!<br><br>Die wichtigsten Kitabote-Funktionen:<br>Neuigkeiten<br>Chat-Funktion mit Push-Benachrichtigung<br>Termine<br>Speiseplan<br><br>Die wichtigsten Kitabote-Funktionen im Detail:<br><br>Neuigkeiten = Das schwarze Brett &amp; Aushänge in Ihrer Hand<br>Unter Neuigkeiten stellt die jeweilige Kindergartenleitung aktuelle Informationen ein, welche die gesamte Kita betreffen. So können Sie zum Beispiel den Newsletter auch unterwegs lesen.<br><br>1-zu-1-Chat zwischen Eltern &amp; Kita-Leitung<br>Hier können Sie sich als Eltern mit der Leitung in einem Chat direkt Informationen austauschen. In diesem Chat tauschen sich die beiden Eltern des Kindes und die Kitaleitung in einem geschlossenen Chat-Raum aus. D.h. hier können Sie morgens schnell kommunizieren, wenn das Kind wegen Krankheit nicht in die Kita kommt, oder Sie werden informiert, wenn etwas nur Sie und Ihr Kind betrifft. Z.B. eine Erinnerung an das nächste Entwicklungsgespräch. Das Entlastet die Kita immens, da weniger in der Kita angerufen werden muss.<br><br>Notfall-Infos an alle Eltern per Gruppen-Info:<br>Hier kann die Kita-Leitung mit einem klick eine Nachricht an alle Eltern direkt auf deren Smartphone schicken. Diese sehen sofort, dass es etwas Wichtiges in der Kita gibt und sind so informiert. Das ist wichtig bei einer ansteckenden Krankheit in der Kita oder falls die Kita im Notfall geschlossen werden muss. Auch wenn morgens klar wird, dass eine Gruppe zu bleiben muss, können so die Eltern direkt informiert werden, bevor sie in die Kita kommen und dann wieder nach Hause müssen. Gut zu wissen ist, dass es keinen Chat in der gesamten Kita oder Gruppe gibt, sondern eine Info von der Kita an mehrere Eltern.<br><br><br>Termine = Eltern sind über alle Termine und deren Änderungen immer informiert<br>So haben Sie alle Daten &amp; Zeiten auf einen Blick parat. Sie können kurz nochmal prüfen, wann das Sommerfest losgeht, oder wann z.B. der nächste Elternabend ist.<br><br>Speiseplan = Der Speiseplan ;)<br>Unter Speiseplan können Sie den Speiseplan der Woche abrufen.<br><br>Die Kitabote-App kann kostenlos heruntergeladen werden.Damit Sie mit Ihrer Kita kommunizieren können, muss diese Ihnen die Einladung mit den Zugangsdaten schicken. "com.hafidz.indon354"	"Hafiz Indonesia"	"10000"	"4.7"	"<div jsname=""sngebd"">Siapa yang tak mau anak kita atau bahkan diri kita menjadi seorang penghafal alquran (hafidz)? Sungguh beruntung bagi setiap penghafal Alquran, pasalnya mereka (hafidz/hafidzah) sudah dijanjikan oleh Allah berupa ganjaran pahala serta kedudukannya di akherat.<br>Para hafidz disejajarkan dengan para nabi (sederajat), hanya saja para hafidz ini tidak mendapatkan atau  dititipkan wahyu. Rasulullah Saw., bersabda, “Barangsiapa yang membaca (menghafal) Alquran, maka sungguh dirinya telah menyamai derajat kenabian hanya saja tidak ada wahyu baginya (penghafal). Tidak pantas bagi penghafal Alquran bersama siapa saja yang ia dapati dan tidak melakukan kebodohan terhadap orang yang melakukan kebodohan (selektif dalam bergaul) sementara dalam dirnya terdapat firman Allah.” (HR. Hakim)<br><br>Serta bagi para penghafal quran akan mendapatkan beberapa keutamaan.<br>1. Allah akan memberikan kepada hafidz di akherat; mahkota kehormatan. <br>2. Akan dikumpulan bersama malaikat yang mulia lagi taat. “Dan perumpamaan orang yang membaca Quran sedangkan ia hafal ayat-ayatNya bersama para malaikat yang mulia dan taat.” (Muttafaqun ‘alaih).<br>3. Para hafidz pun akan ditinggikan derajatnya saat berada disurga. Betapa baiknya manfaat Al- Qur’an untuk para penghapalnya. Sesuai dengan sebuah hadits yang bunyinya, dari Abdillah bin Amri bin ‘Ash dari nabi SAW.<br>4. Para hafidz quran akan mendapatkan pertolongan (syafaat)<br>5. Taksaja bagi para hafidz itu sendiri, orangtua para penghafal alquran pun akan mendapatkan pertolongan. Dalam hadits disebutkan, Rasulullah Saw. bersabda “Siapa yang membaca Alquran, mempelajarinya dan mengamalkannya, maka dipakaikan mahkota dari cahaya pada hari kiamat, cahayanya seperti cahaya matahari, kedua orang tuanya dipakaikan dua jubah (kemuliaan), yang tidak pernah didapatkan di dunia, keduanya bertanya: mengapa kami dipakaikan jubah ini? Dijawab “Karena kalian berdua memerintahkan anak kalian untuk mempelajari Alquran”. (HR. Al Hakim).<br>6. Menghafal Alquran berfaedah bagi setiap penghafal dalam urusan perniagaan mereka. Dalam Alquran dijelaskan, “Sesungguhnya orang-orang yang selalu membaca kitab Allah dan mendirikan sholat dan menafkahkan sebagian rezeki yang Kami anugerahkan kepada mereka dengan diam-diam dan terang-terangan, mereka itu mengharapkan perniagaan yang tidak akan merugi, agar Allah menyempurnakan kepada mereka pahala dan menambah kepada mereka dari karunia-Nya. Sesungguhnya Allah Maha Pengampun lagi Maha Mensyukuri.” (QS Faathir : 29-30).<br><br>Berikut cara mendidik anak agar kelak ia menjadi seorang hafiz<br>1. Memulai dari yang Halal<br>Satu syarat mutlak mencetak anak yang saleh, apalagi penghafal Al-Quran adalah dengan memastikan bahwa makanan yang masuk ke tubuh kita dan anak kita adalah makanan yang halal dan berasal dari sumber yang halal.<br>2. Perdengarkanlah Al-Quran di Setiap Kesempatan<br>Hal ini bertujuan memperkenalkan Al-Quran sejak dini sehingga mereka tidak asing dengan lafadz-lafadz yang ada di tiap ayatnya. Ingatlah bahwa anak balita itu seperti spons yang mudah menyerap apa pun yang berasal dari lingkungannya, apalagi jika dilakukan berulang kali. Jadi, lakukanlah di setiap kesempatan.<br>3. Jadilah Orang Tua yang Menjadi Contoh bagi Anak<br>4. Bacakan Ayat-Ayat Al-Quran Sejak Anak dalam Kandungan<br>5. Gunakan Metode yang Unik dan Menarik<br>6. Berikan Apresiasi Setiap Kali Anak Mampu dan Mau Menghafal<br>7. Terimalah Anak Apa Adanya, Pun Ketika Ia sedang Malas Menghafal Alquran<br>8. Konsisten<br><br>Nah dalam menerapkan poin nomor 2. ""지음""이란<br>“내가 그의 이름을 불러주었을 때,<br>그는 나에게로 와서 꽃이 되었다”<br> - 김춘수의 '꽃' 중에서<br><br>아이가 태어났습니다.<br>아이가 자라나며 엄마, 아빠가 가장 많이 들려줄 말은 바로 아이의 이름입니다.<br><br>아이의 이름을 ‘짓다’<br>아이의 인생을 ‘짓다’<br>“지음”이 가지고 있는 두 가지 의미입니다.<br><br>“지음”은<br>엄마, 아빠의 사랑을 담아 아이의 행복한 인생을 기원하며<br>정성을 다해 소중한 의미의 이름을 짓습니다.<br><br>새 생명에게 주는 첫 번째 선물 ‘이름’<br>“지음”이 도와드리겠습니다.<br><br>2. “지음”은?<br> - 2015년부터 시행 중인 대법원 인명용한자 약 8,100자 제공<br> - 불용문자 / 발음 및 의미가 좋지 않은 한자 등 1차 선별<br> - 최근 선호 이름 및 개명 리스트 등 2차 선별<br> - 학자형, 재물형, 제가형 등 총 6가지 유형별 추천 이름 제공<br> - 고전 스타일, 지음 스타일 등 취향에 따른 두 가지 버전의 작명서 제공<br> - 카카오톡 및 페이스북을 통한 공유하기 기능 제공<br> - 가장 신뢰할 수 있는 성명학 이론을 반영하여 가장 좋은 이름을 추천해 드립니다.<br><br>3. ""지음""의 구성<br>- 좋은 이름 짓기<br>추천 이름 받기는 아이의 기본 사주를 분석한 후, “지음”의 작명 솔루션을 적용하여 최상의 좋은 이름을 추천해 드립니다. 또한 학자형, 인품형, 출세형 등과 같이 유형별 추천도 가능합니다.<br><br>발음으로 짓기는 한글 발음을 이용하여 부모님께서 직접 이름을 지을 수 있도록 도와주는 서비스를 제공합니다.<br><br>한자로 짓기는 한자를 이용하여 부모님께서 직접 이름을 지을 수 있도록 도와주는 서비스를 제공합니다.<br><br>My 지음의 구매 내역에서는 구입하신 서비스 내용을, 지음 목록에서는 작명하신 이름의 결과를 확인하실 수 있습니다. 작명서에서는 최종 선택하신 작명서 PDF 저장 및 카카오톡과 페이스북을 통한 공유가 가능합니다. 또한 최종 작명서는 고전 스타일과 지음 스타일 두 가지 버전으로 제공해 드립니다.<br><br>- 무료 감명<br>사용자의 기본 정보를 입력하시면 사주를 분석한 후, ""지음""에서 적용한 성명학 원리에 따라 이름을 감명해주는 무료 서비스입니다.<br><br>- 한 눈에 보는 성명학<br>사용자들이 쉽게 작명할 수 있도록 도와주는 지음 가이드와 ""지음""이 지원하는 성명학 기본 원리를 이해 및 적용할 수 있는 내용을 포함하고 있습니다.<br><br>- 순 우리말 이름 보기<br>순 우리말 이름 리스트와 이름이 가지고 있는 의미를 알려드리는 ""지음""의 무료 서비스 입니다.<br><br>4. FAQ<br>· 사용하고 싶은 한자가 리스트에 없어요.<br>→ ""지음""은 대법원 인명용 한자를 기반으로 하는 작명 솔루션으로 인명용 한자로 지정이 되지 않은 한자는 리스트에 없습니다.<br><br>· 인명용 한자로 지정이 되지 않은 한자는 이름으로 사용하지 못하는 한자이오니, 참고 부탁 드립니다. 외자 및 이자성 이름은 지원하지 않나요?<br>→ ""지음”은 일자성(一字姓) 이자명(二字名)만 서비스 지원 중으로 외자 및 이자성은 현재 서비스를 지원하지 않습니다.<br><br>· 온/오프라인 작명소 및 다른 어플과 작명 결과가 달라요.<br>→ ""지음”은 가장 널리 쓰이고 있는 보편적이고 신뢰할 수 있는 성명학 이론을 반영한 솔루션입니다. 다른 작명업체와 차이가 발생하는 이유는 작명 적용 원리, 솔루션의 프로세스, 데이터베이스 등의 이유로 판단됩니다. 저희 솔루션에 적용된 작명 이론은 한 눈에 보는 성명학에 설명된 내용이오니 참고 부탁 드립니다.<br><br>· 작명 결과 페이지에서 깃털은 무슨 의미인가요?<br>→ ""지음”의 깃털은 ""지음”의 로고를 상징화한 것으로 별점과 같이 좋고 나쁨을 표현하는 ""지음”만의 방식입니다. 일반적으로 노란색 깃털 5개는 가장 좋다는 의미이고, 빈 깃털이 많을수록 좋지 않은 의미입니다. 또한 깃털 한 개로 표시된 일부 항목은 노란색 깃털 한 개가 좋고, 빈 깃털은 좋지 않은 의미를 가지고 있습니다.<br><br>· 무료 감명은 최근 한 달 이내에 태어난 아기의 정보는 입력이 안되나요?<br>→ ""지음”의 감명 서비스는 무료로 제공하는 서비스입니다. 무료 감명을 신생아 작명으로 이용하는 경우를 방지하고자 해당 서비스에 제한을 두었습니다. 법적으로 신생아 출생신고 기간은 한 달 이내에 이루어져야 하며, 이 기간에 맞춰 부득이하게 한 달의 이용 제한을 두었으니 참고 부탁 드립니다. <br>아기 이름의 무료 감명은 생후 1개월이 지난 이후에 사용 가능합니다.<br>----<br>개발자 연락처 :<br>02-466-3781</div>"	"0.00"	"Parenting"	"216"

Son utilisation conduit à  ouvrir la réflexion de manière globale sur toutes les dimensions, positives ou négatives, du numérique.<br><br>Dclicp@rents est :<br>•	Un outil familier, accessible gratuitement et ouvert sur les innovations numériques.<br>•	Un support ludique à l’échange et la réflexion sur les pratiques numériques des enfants<br>•	Une source d'informations vérifiées et actualisées<br>•	Surtout, pour ceux qui s'interrogent : “Quel parent je suis pour mon enfant connecté ?”<br><br>Partant des constats que les outils numériques font partie de notre quotidien,  ces objets (smartphone, internet, écrans, jeux vidéo,  réseaux sociaux, objets connectés....) tour à tour fascinants, angoissants et sources de nombreux fantasmes, nécessitent d'être apprivoisés plutôt que diabolisés. Les enfants et adolescents démontrent une habileté et une facilité déconcertante à se les approprier.<br>Aussi, comment ne pas en être exclus en tant que parents pour en comprendre le sens, les risques et les opportunités ?<br><br>Cette application se veut une invitation aux adultes à se plonger dans les médias numériques pour communiquer avec les jeunes, les accompagner et poser un cadre cohérent.<br><br>Dclicp@rents peut être utilisée à la fois comme un outils éducatif par les parents et un support pédagogique pour les acteurs socio-éducatifs intervenant dans le champ du soutien à la parentalité.<br>L'application utilisée avec le jeu de cartes de 7 familles (téléchargeable sur le site dlclicparents.fr),  peut servir à jouer en famille ou à animer  des groupes d'échanges entre parents sur les pratiques numériques de leur enfants. L'application utilise alors la technique de la réalité augmentée, qui reconnaît les différentes cartes et fait apparaître questions ou mises en situation, qui engageront échanges et réflexions. "com.insleep.sounds"	"inSleep - Baby Sleep Sounds"	"10000"	"4.7"	"<div jsname=""sngebd"">What is inSleep?<br><br>inSleep is a baby sleep application. It allows your baby to fall asleep quickly. There are many white sounds inside. White noises are healthy, safe and recommended by health professionals. It is tested and approved to sleep your baby with white noises.<br><br>inSleep is the best and easiest thing you can use to help you and your baby sleep better.<br>★ Helps babies sleep<br>★ Helps babies cry less<br>★ Reduces stress in babies<br>★ Helps you sleep<br><br>What is White Noises?<br>In simple terms, white noise is a special type of sound signal which is used to mask background sounds. When used to promote healthy sleep, white noise helps to drown out sounds which might otherwise prevent your baby from either falling asleep or waking up whilst asleep.<br>In technical terms white noise can be described as noise whose amplitude is constant throughout the audible frequency range.<br>A useful analogy is that of white light, which as we all know from school, contains all the colours (frequencies) combined together.<br>White noise theory has it’s origins in mathematics and engineering and these days it has applications in fields as diverse as acoustics, electronics, computer programming and even economics. If you want to delve deeper, Wikipedia which has an excellent resource on the science of white noise.<br><br>Babies, White Noise and Sleep<br>All newborns start with an ‘untrained’ sleep/wake cycle. Over the first few months, babies start to adjust to the natural transition of day and night. The holy grail is to get the baby sleeping through the night.<br>But no two babies are the same and sometimes sleep training or ‘crying it out‘ leads nowhere. In these circumstances many parents turn to white noise as a baby sleep solution.<br>Even before they’re born, babies are quite used to loud noises. The womb, is a surprisingly noisy environment. However, all  babies have an immature nervous system which makes them especially ‘jumpy’. The ‘moro reflex‘ causes them to physically flinch when they are startled by a loud noise or loss of support. Swaddling can help stifle the physical effects of this reflex, but if sleep problems persist, white noise could provide some help.<br>White noise is not unlike the instinctive ‘shhhush’-ing sound parents make when trying to comfort or quieten their child. It masks any sounds which might otherwise startle the infant. Babies have sensitive hearing so it’s best to keep the volume to a conversation level.<br><br>Should My Baby Sleep With White Noise?<br>In short, Yes. Babies have just come from an incredibly loud womb. As in as loud as busy city traffic! They are used to loud. And if you know anything about babies, you know they like what they are used to. If you want to set your baby up for the best sleep possible, use inSleep.<br><br>Keep in mind that these are recommended averages. Every baby is different. বাবা-মার এই চিন্তা লেগে থাকে কিভাবে তার শিশুর মেধা ও বিকাশ বৃদ্ধি হবে। শিশুর কিছু নিয়মিত পুষ্টিগুণ সম্পন্ন খাবার দৈহিক ও মানসিক বিকাশে সাহায্য করে থাকে। তবে এটাও ঠিক, সব খাবারে একই পুষ্টিগুন থাকে না, এমন কিছু খাবার আছে যার মধ্যে অনেক বেশি পুষ্টিগুন বিদ্যমান। যা শিশুর মস্তিষ্ক সক্রিয় ও সতেজ রাখে। আর মস্তিষ্ক সক্রিয় এবং সতেজ থাকলে শিশুর মেধা ও বুদ্ধি বিকাশ ত্বরান্বিত হয়। যেহেতু শিশুদের বেড়ে ওঠায় কিছু খাবার অনেক বেশি ভূমিকা রাখে। সেহেতু আমাদের মনে রাখতে হবে সেই খাবারগুলো শিশুদের যাতে বেশি করে দেওয়া যায়। আর এই বিষয়ও দেখতে হবে যে ছোট বাচ্ছাদের পাকস্থলী ছোট থাকে তাই তাদের পেট অল্পতেই ভরে যায়। এই ক্ষেত্রে আপনাকে চেষ্টা করতে হবে অল্প পরিমাণ খাদ্য দিয়ে কিভাবে বেশি করে পুষ্টি দিতে পারেন। পনির প্রচুর পরিমাণে পুষ্টিসমৃদ্ধ একটি দুধজাতীয় খাবার। এতে আছে প্রচুর আমিষ এবং ক্যালসিয়াম, যা সুস্থ হাড় ও দাঁতের জন্য আবশ্যক। একই সাথে পনির মুখের ভেতর যে অ্যাসিড দাঁতের ক্ষয়ের জন্য দায়ী, সেগুলোকে নিষ্ক্রিয় করে দেয়। সুতরাং এই খাবার শিশুর জন্য অনেক গুরুত্বপূর্ণ। আর সব চেয়ে বড় কথা মস্তিষ্ক মানবদেহের অন্যান্য অংশের বিকাশ ও সঠিক পরিচালনা অনেকাংশেই নির্ভর করে। তাই শিশুকালেই এই অতি গুরুত্বপূর্ণ অঙ্গটির উপযুক্ত বিকাশ নিশ্চিত করা প্রয়োজন। চলুন জেনে নেই মস্তিষ্কের ক্ষমতা বাড়াতে সন্তানকে কোন খাবারগুলো খেতে দেয়া বেশি দরকার।<br><br>ব্রেকফাস্ট সিরিয়াল বা কর্নফ্লেকস<br>শিশুদের দিন শুরু করার ভাল একটি উপায় হলো এক বাটি সিরিয়াল দেওয়া। তবে সাবধান হতে হবে কারন বাচ্চারা যে সব সিরিয়াল পছন্দ করে বা খায় তার উপাদানের প্রায় ৫০ শতাংশ জুড়েই থাকে চিনি। এই সিরিয়ালগুলো অনেক বেশি প্রসেসিংয়ের মধ্য দিয়ে যায়। যার ফলে এগুলোতে ফাইবার, ভিটামিন ও খনিজ উপাদান থাকে খুবই কম আর লবণ থাকে প্রচুর। ওইসব ক্ষতিকর সিরিয়াল বাদ দিয়ে কর্নফ্লেকস, উইটাবিক্স, গ্র্যানোলা, মিউজলি এবং পরিজের মতো সিরিয়ালগুলো খাওয়া অনেক বেশি স্বাস্থ্যকর। আপনার সন্তান যদি তার এই সিরিয়ালের বাটিতে আলাদা চিনি মেশায়, তাও ওই চিনিভরা সিরিয়ালগুলোর চেয়ে অনেক অনেক কম চিনি থাকবে।<br><br>ডিম<br>ডিম খাওয়া নিয়ে প্রায় শিশুদেরই নাই থাকে। তবে না খেতে চাইলেও শিশুকে প্রতিদিন অন্তত একটি ডিম খাওয়াতে চেষ্টা করতে হবে। কারণ গবেষণায় দেখা যায়, যারা প্রতিদিন অন্তত একটি ডিম খায় তাদের স্মৃতিশক্তি অন্যদের তুলনায় অন্তত ৭০% বেশি ভালো থাকে। ডিমে রয়েছে প্রচুর আয়রন। যা লোহিত কণিকা তৈরি করে রক্তের উপাদানে সঠিক মাত্রা বজায় রাখে। এতে মস্তিষ্কে অক্সিজেন সরবরাহ হয়। যা চিন্তাশক্তি ও বুদ্ধিমত্তা বাড়াতেও সাহায্য করে।<br><br>কিউই<br>একটি কিউইতে একটি কমলার প্রায় দ্বিগুণ ভিটামিন সি থাকে, যা পূর্ণবয়স্ক একজন মানুষের একদিনের ভিটামিন সি’র চাহিদা পূরণে সক্ষম। ভিটামিন সি খাদ্য থেকে দেহে আয়রন শোষণের ক্ষমতা বাড়াতে সাহায্য করে। ভিটামিন সি দেহে জমা থাকতে পারে না। তাই শিশুদের প্রতিদিনই কিউই বা ভিটামিন সি’তে ভরপুর অন্য খাবার খেতে দিতে হবে।<br><br>কলা<br>কলা এমন একটি ফল, যাতে আছে প্রচুর পরিমাণে বলকারক কার্বোহাইড্রেট বা শর্করা। সকালে নাস্তার কিছু সময় পর হালকা স্ন্যাক হিসেবে একটি কলা খেলে আপনার বাচ্চাটি পুরোটা সকাল জুড়েই তার শক্তি ধরে রাখতে পারবে। ফলে যে কোনো কাজে তার মনোযোগ দেয়ার ক্ষমতাও বাড়বে। তাই টুকিটাকি স্ন্যাক হিসেবে সন্তানের ব্যাগে চিপস বা বিস্কিটের প্যাকেটের বদলে একটি কলা দিয়ে দিন।<br><br>শুকনো ফল<br>যে সব ফল শুকিয়ে রাখা যায় সেগুলোতে থাকে প্রচুর পরিমাণে আয়রন। এগুলো হলো ব্যাপক শক্তির উৎস। তাই শিশুদের শুকনো ফল খাওয়ানোর অভ্যাস করতে হবে। তাহলে শিশুর মেধা বিকাশে অনেক প্রসারতা লাভ করবে। তাই মাদের উচিত চকলেট খেতে না দিয়ে শুকনা ফল দেওয়ার অভ্যাস করানো। এতে শিশুর দাঁতও ভাল থাকবে।<br><br>পনির<br>ফ্যাট কম, ফাইবার বেশি – এ ধরণের খাদ্য গ্রহণের গাইডলাইন বড়দের জন্য, ছোটদের জন্য নয়। শিশুদের বর্ধিষ্ণু দেহের জন্য দরকার তুলনামূলক বেশি ফ্যাট ও কম শর্করা। এতে তারা দেহে বেশি শক্তি পায় এবং বিভিন্ন কাজ অনেক ভালোভাবে করতে পারে।<br><br>বাদাম<br>শিশুকে প্রতিদিনই কয়েকটি করে বাদাম খেতে দিন। কারণ বাদামে রয়েছে ভিটামিন ‘ই’ যা মস্তিষ্কের সমন্বয় সাধনের ক্ষমতা বাড়ায়। কাজুবাদাম, পেস্তা Morał może znajdować się na początku (promythium) lub na końcu (epimythium) utworu albo wynikać z jego treści. Istotną cechą bajki jest alegoryczność. Bohaterami bajek mogą być ludzie, a także zwierzęta, przedmioty i zjawiska, które uosabiają typy ludzkie, cechy charakteru lub przeciwstawne poglądy i stanowiska. Jest jedną z odmian epiki, choć bajka epigramatyczna ma dużo cech lirycznych.<br><br>Baśń – jeden z fantastycznych gatunków epickich, zazwyczaj niewielkich rozmiarów, przynależy do folkloru.<br><br>Bajka magiczna (fantastyczna) - zwana niekiedy baśnią lub klechdą , jest najbardziej typowym i charakterystycznym okazem bajki ludowej, ""bajką właściwą"", jak się czasami mówi. Terminy, które się do niej stosuje, określają jej cechę podstawową, domieszkę lub nawet przewagę pierwiastków fikcyjnych, fantastycznych, cudownych, czy czarodziejskich nad realnymi, ludzkimi. Są to pierwiastki te same, które występują w religii, wyrastają z dawnych wierzeń magicznych, od religijnych zaś różnią się tym tylko, że nie mają oficjalnego uznania, nie wchodzą do kanonu wierzeń, reprezentowanego przez taką czy inną organizację religijną. Ponieważ przedstawicielką sił magicznych, zazwyczaj przyjaznych człowiekowi, bywa istota męska lub kobieca, w języku angielskim zwana Fairy, we francuskim Fée, co u nas oddaje się wyrazem wróżka, skąd terminy angielskie i francuskie na oznaczenie danej kategorii bajek<br><br><br>Kołysanka – krótka piosenka śpiewana a cappella używana w celu usypiania dzieci. Zwykle występuje w metrum 6/8, co daje wrażenie kołysania. Zakończona łagodnym diminuendo połączonym z ritardando. Do muzyki poważnej zaadaptowana w okresie romantyzmu jako miniatura fortepianowa. Zachowała cechy jej śpiewanego odpowiednika: liryczną, powolną linię melodyczną z stałym, kołyszącym, dwunutowym akompaniamentem (lewej ręki), opartym na tonice i dominancie. Do najsłynniejszych kołysanek należy Kołysanka Johannesa Brahmsa.</div>"	"0.00"	"Parenting"	"142"

"com.kidsapps.WhiteNoiseApp"	"Белый шум"	"0"	"0"	"<div jsname=""sngebd"">Малыши любят белый шум – ровный шумовой фон, напоминающий привычные звуки в животике у мамы. Белый шум помогает детям спать дольше и крепче, способствует более быстрому засыпанию, может успокоить ребенка или даже прекратить плач.<br><br>Белый шум поможет «отгородиться» от резких звуков, нарушающих сон<br><br>Если у вас большая семья и жизнь идет своим чередом, пока младший ребенок спит – белый шум в комнате спящего малыша может стать вашим спасением. А также он понадобится, если в комнате спит больше одного ребенка, кто-то из родителей храпит или, вставая рано по утрам, непременно будит других членов семьи.<br><br>Белый шум можно и нужно использовать в течение всей продолжительности ночного и дневных снов, при следующих условиях:<br>- Громкость белого шума (у головы малыша) не превышает 50 дБ.<br>- Источник белого шума находится не ближе метра от места, где спит ребенок.<br>- Звук белого шума является комфортным для всех членов семьи, которые спят в этой комнате.<br><br>Если малыш сильно плачет (например, от усталости, перевозбуждения или стресса), белый шум, особенно в сочетании с покачиванием, сосанием и пеленанием, действительно способен творить чудеса. И чтобы чудо получилось, крайне полезно знать 2 правила использования белого шума в подобной ситуации:<br><br>Когда малыш плачет, белый шум должен звучать чуть громче, чем плач ребенка. Малыш должен его услышать сквозь свой громкий крик, «узнать» и начать прислушиваться.<br>Как только малыш успокоился (как правило, через 1-5 минут), необходимо убавить громкость белого шума до 50дБ (шум дождя или воды из душа).<br><br>Белый шум напоминает звук крови, циркулирующей в сосудах плаценты. «Этот звук ребенок круглосуточно, без перерывов слышит в утробе матери, и именно поэтому белый шум является мощной стимуляцией врожденного механизма самоуспокоения ребенка» – убежден известный американский педиатр, доцент кафедры педиатрии Медицинского института Южной Калифорнии Харви Карп.<br><br>Обратите внимание, что шум фена из примера выше помог маме прекратить плач младенца и способствовал расслаблению ребенка. Использование такого уровня шума (фен, пылесос, шум городской улицы) допустимо в течение непродолжительного времени (несколько минут) с целью успокоить раскричавшегося малыша.</div>"	"0.99"	"Parenting"	"0"
"com.kidsapps.WhiteNoiseAppFree"	"White noise. Sounds for kids."	"100"	"4.3"	"<div jsname=""sngebd"">Babies love white noise - an even noise background that resembles the usual sounds in mom's tummy. White noise helps children sleep longer and stronger, helps to fall asleep faster, can calm the child or even stop crying.<br>White noise will help ""isolate"" from the harsh sounds that disturb sleep<br>If you have a big family and life goes on as usual, while the youngest child is sleeping - white noise in the sleeping baby's room can be your salvation. And he will also need it if more than one child sleeps in the room, one of the parents snores or, getting up early in the morning, certainly wakes up other family members.<br>White noise can and should be used throughout the duration of night and daytime dreams, under the following conditions:<br>- The volume of white noise (at the head of the baby) does not exceed 50 dB.<br>- The source of white noise is no closer than a meter from the place where the child sleeps.<br>- The sound of white noise is comfortable for all family members who sleep in this room.<br><br>If the baby cries a lot (for example, from tiredness, over-excitement or stress), white noise, especially in combination with rocking, sucking and swaddling, is really capable of working wonders. And so that the miracle happens, it is extremely useful to know 2 rules for using white noise in such a situation:<br><br>When a baby cries, white noise should sound a little louder than a baby’s cry. The kid should hear him through his loud cry, ""learn"" and start listening.<br>As soon as the baby calms down (as a rule, after 1-5 minutes), it is necessary to turn down the volume of white noise to 50 dB (the sound of rain or water from the shower).<br><br>Please note that the noise of the hair dryer from the example above helped the mother to stop the crying of the baby and contributed to the relaxation of the child. The use of such a noise level (hair dryer, vacuum cleaner, noise of a city street) is permissible for a short time (a few minutes) in order to calm the crying child.</div>"	"0.00"	"Parenting"	"7"

"com.kisiinames"	"Kisii names and Meaning"	"50"	"5"	"<div jsname=""sngebd"">Kisii Baby Names<br><br>At the start of every LIFE, there is always a gift. That gift is the name that the baby will use for the rest of his/her life. The name will form part of the identity to the child. In Africa every ethnic community has a ceremony for naming babies and the names have meaning depending with the naming context of the respective tribe.<br><br>Every community names their loved ones with names that carry a meaning or symbol.  “Gusii” or “Abagusii” is the people's name for themselves. A Gusii individual is an “Omogusii.” “Kisii” is the Swahili name that the British colonial administration used, and it is still the common name used by other inhabitants of Kenya. The Gusii are divided into seven clan clusters: Kitutu (Getutu), North Mugirango, South Mugirango, Majoge, Wanjare (Nchari), Bassi, and Nyaribari.<br><br>This App has the following features:<br><br>- Names and meaning of Abagusii. Example: Moraa, Nyabuto, Motari, Omugambi, Omoruoti, Kerubo, Kwamboka, Nyaboke among others.<br>- Favourite feature.<br>- Share button.<br>- Copy button.<br>- Kisii baby names and meaning.<br><br>Kisii people, in particular, have names in relation to the surroundings including circumstances during the birth, recent events and many more. <br><br>Are u blessed with a baby? Or do you want to know the meaning of the names of the Abagusii people? <br><br>Here are some of the examples, read and share this App.</div>"	"0.00"	"Parenting"	"1"

"com.lullaby.choi.netflyus"	"●Baby Songs To Go To Sleep - Prenatal Lullabies"	"50"	"3"	"<div jsname=""sngebd"">◆Baby Songs To Go To Sleep<br><br>Some babies fall asleep at the drop of a hat, whilst others seem to struggle to settle down for their sleeps and all sleep deprived parents of young babies long to have babies that sleep easily and wake refresh and in a good mood. Luckily, this can be achieved by introducing a pre sleep routine that incorporates baby songs to get to sleep.<br>Whilst all babies like to sleep and it is something that they spend much of their time doing in the early months, sadly, most babies find the transition from being awake to falling asleep difficult some times and particularly around the four month point as they alter their sleep patterns to sleeping much more at night and having just one nap in the morning and one in the afternoon.<br>Babies as young as six weeks are clever enough to understand a pre-sleep routine so it is well worth getting one established by this age and to consider incorporating baby song to go to sleep. Traditional lullabies ( sometimes called ‘cradle songs’) have worked well in aiding babies to relax and fall asleep and medical studies have shown that babies often sleep more soundly if they have been sung a lullaby as they will have dozed off happy and relaxed rather than stressed and agitated as they have had difficulties settling and have become over tired.<br><br>It is well worth thinking about sleep routines both for day time sleeps and at bedtime. There needs to be a distinct change in tempo as babies are easily excited and stimulated by everyday family life. True, babies will often fall asleep on a car journey or family walk where they are lulled by the car engine or buggy, but when they are at home, it is best to move them to the nursery as they show signs of tiredness. Close the curtains so that the light is dim and place them in their bed as you sing to them and very soon your baby will fall asleep – but continue singing  for a few minutes as an abrupt ending could cause your baby to wake again!<br>The difference between day and night is something young babies do not know, so it is well worth thinking about your baby’s bedtime routine. Specialists say that the routine should last no more than 30 minutes and than a warm bath followed by nappy change and nightclothes is beneficial. A bedtime feed should follow and as baby looks tired you can gently start singing your baby songs to go to sleep, settling him in his cot before he actually falls asleep.<br>An important consideration about the bedtime routine is lighting in the nursery.  Whilst you will need a little light to see what you are doing and for night time feeds, bright lights will be like sunshine to your baby and will stimulate him to stay wide awake and play – groan!<br>Far better to use a dimmer switch on your light or a soft night light as this will help your baby to relax after his feed and with the help of your lullabies, drift off to sleep soon….and the big bonus is that you will be able to do the same! .<br><br>1. "com.madsaz"	"Madsaz Baby Cry Translator (PenerjemahTangis Bayi)"	"10000"	"4.5"	"<div jsname=""sngebd"">This ""madsaz"" application is used to translate (identity) an infant (0-3 months old) cries, to make parents understand their baby better. There are five languages of the DBL version that can be recognized by this application, such as: neh means hunger, owh means tiredness, eh means belch, eairh means bloat, heh means inconvenience (could be due to a wet diaper, too hot or cold air, on anything else)<br><br>There are two languages: IN and EN<br><br>=================================================================<br><br>Aplikasi madsaz merupakan aplikasi pertama di Indonesia yang mampu menerjemahkan tangisan bayi usia 0-3 bulan (bersifat universal walaupun berbeda negara, suku bangsa, dan bahasa) dengan tingkat akurasi hingga 94%. Sedangkan untuk bayi berusia 4 bulan ke atas akan berbeda-beda, tergantung pada lingkungan dan kebudayaan masing-masing. <br><br>Aplikasi ini mampu mendeteksi lima jenis tangisan bayi yaitu tangisan:<br>*  “neh” yang berarti lapar, <br>*  “owh” berarti lelah yang mengindikasikan bayi mulai mengantuk, <br>*  “eh”  berarti  ingin sendawa, <br>*  “eairh”  berarti masuk angin (perut kembung), <br>*  “heh” berarti bayi merasa tidak nyaman (bisa karena popoknya basah, udara terlalu panas atau dingin, atau hal lainnya).<br><br>Manfaat yang diperoleh dengan adanya aplikasi ini adalah: para orang tua yang baru mempunyai anak dapat dengan cepat dan mudah mengetahui arti tangisan bayinya. Hal ini membuat orang tua merasa lebih percaya diri dalam mengasuh bayinya dan by the end of the day, tingkat stres mereka berkurang signifikan. Di sisi lain, bayi cepat tenang karena orang tua dapat mengambil tindakan yang tepat berdasarkan arti tangisan bayinya. Ketenangan ibu dan anak ini tentunya sangat berdampak terhadap kesehatan keduanya.<br><br><br>Aplikasi ini menyediakan dua bahasa, Indonesia dan English. Cara menggunakan aplikasi ini sangat mudah yaitu dengan menekan tulisan ”REKAM” (IN) atau ""RECORD""(EN) ketika bayi menangis. Output/arti tangis bayi akan ditampilkan di layar HP dalam waktu kurang lebih 20 detik setelah proses perekaman (button berwarna pink untuk klasifikasi output yang dihasilkan).  Selain menampilkan arti tangis bayi, aplikasi ini akan menampilkan solusi yang dapat dilakukan oleh orang dewasa kepada bayi sesuai dengan klasifikasi tangisannya.<br><br><br>:: INFO APLIKASI MADSAZ :: <br>Requirement aplikasi madsaz di playstore sudah ada ya (bisa dibaca-baca terlebih dahulu) :). Step2를 활용해 직접 아기이름 을 지어 보시는 방법을 추천 드립니다. 그 이유는 아이를 직접 본 부모님이나 가족들이 아이에게 가장 어울리는 이름을 만들 수 있고 누구보다 정성을 들일 수 있기 때문입니다. <br><br>하지만 한글 이름이나 이에 적합한 한자를 좀더 쉽게 실시간으로 파악하고 싶으시다던가 마땅한 이름이 떠오르지 않으신다면 Step3의 기능을 활용하실 수도 있으며 단 이 기능은 유료로 제공되는 부분임을 양해 부탁드립니다.<br><br>♥ Sub Category : 스스로 작명 PRO<br><br>스스로 작명 PRO는 직접 이름짓기 를 하시는 부모님께 좀더 쉽게 적합한 한글 및 한자 이름을 만들어 보실 수  있도록 고안된 스스로 작명 BASIC의 확장판입니다. 생각하시는 한글 이름을 입력해 보시고 오행과 음양 등이 적합한지 판단해 보세요. 그 후 한글 이름에 적합한 한자 들은 획수와 자원 오행 기반으로 추천드리는 한자를 선택하시면 됩니다. 넴유베가 추천(엄지손가락, 느낌표 이미지) 드리는 한자는 작명 조건이 매우 좋은 한자 입니다. 추천되는 한자가 없다면 모든 조건을 충족 시키는 그 한글 발음의 한자가 없기 때문입니다. 엄지 손가락과 느낌표 이미지의 추천이 동시에 되는 한자를 찾으시면 한자 작명 조건이 모두 좋은 결과를 얻으실 수 있습니다. 단 한글 이름이 마음에 들어 모든 조건을 만족 시키지 않아도 된다고 판단하시면 추천 되지 않는 다른 한자들을 선택 하시면서 최대한 조건이 좋은 한자들을 만들어 가시면 됩니다. <br><br>♥ Sub Category : 이름 추천 받기 <br><br>본 기능은 기본 정보를 입력하면 정보에 부합되는 적합한 이름을 제시해 드립니다. 제공되는 이름은 한글 발음으로 조합 가능한 약 20만개의 한글 이름 중 조건을 적용한 이름을 1차 Filtering 후 2차의 선별 과정과 3차 선호도 조사 방식을 통해 적용 하였습니다. 선호도 조사 대상은 20대에서 40대의 젊은 부모 100인을 대상으로 2012년 12월부터 2013년 3월까지 약 4개월 선호도 조사를 수행 했고 그 결과 추출된 선호도가 높은 이름을 기준으로 구성됩니다.<br><br>이후 두음법칙을 포함한 (ex. 류, 유) 278개의 성을 대상으로 성과 이름의 적합도를 검토하고 현재 등록되는 이름들의 조사 결과를 바탕으로 최종적인 이름 Pool을 선별하였고 이를 토대로 서비스를 제공합니다. 또한 한자 이름의 경우 논란의 여지가 많지만 불용 문자라고 일컬어 지는 한자들을 제외 하였으며 다양한 의미를 지니는 한자의 특성 상 부모님들이 민감해 하시는 안 좋은 뜻이 숨어 있는 한자도 가급적 배제하려고 노력하였습니다. 마지막으로 제공되는 이름은 선호도 조사에 기반해 주기적으로 변경되며 현 이름의 Trend를 최대한 반영합니다. <br><br>주의사항 : 단 이름의 선호도는 상당히 주관적인 요소를 포함하고 있습니다. 즉 선호도 조사 결과를 토대로 유추해 보건데 어떤 이름은 사람들마다 선호도 오차가 매우 큼을 알 수 있습니다. 본 작명어플에 포함되어 제공되는 이름은 선호도 조사의 평균치를 토대로 구성되었으므로 개인별 선호도는 존재할 수 있습니다.<br><br>▶ FAQ <br><br>1. 프로그램이 조합한 이름을 제공하나요?<br><br>본 작명어플을 운영하면서 위 질문을 많이 받았습니다. 이 이름에 역으로 질문을 해보고 싶습니다. 프로그램으로 이름 조합이 가능하다고 생각하십니까? 넴유베의 답은 '아니오' 입니다.그 이유는 프로그램은 한글의 조합으로 이루어진 발음이 이름으로 적합한지 아닌지 알 수 없기 때문입니다. 대법원 인명용 사전의 한글 발음으로 조합가능한 이름 Candidate는 약 20만 가지입니다. 그러나 그 중에는 비속어도 섞여 있고 놀림감이 될 수 있는 많은 발음 조합이 있습니다. 프로그램은 그 발음이 비속어인지 아닌지 성과 적합한지 전혀 알 수 없습니다. 즉 넴유베의 추천 이름은 20만가지의 이름들을 개별 성과 붙여 보고 발음해 보면서 이름 하나하나 만들어낸 수작업의 결과물입니다. 여기에 객관성을 확보하기 위해 언급된 선호도 조사와 현재 등록 되고 있는 아기이름 등 여러 자료 들을 반영하였습니다.   <br><br>2. 이름풀이 하는 기능은 제공하지 않나요? <br><br>BASIC의 기능을 이름풀이 감명 개명작명 용도로 사용하실 수 있습니다. 단 이 결과를 바탕으로 단순히 결과가 않좋다고 해 개명 을 고려하신다던가 걱정하지는 마세요. 부모님이 지어주신 소중한 이름을 단순히 사격 수리에 맞지 않는다 하여 이름 개명 하는 것은 지양하는 것이 옳다고 생각됩니다. 개명 이 필요하신 분들은 이름의 어감이 안좋아 놀림을 받고 사회 생활이 위축되는 경우에 한하며 이러한 개명 사유는 사격 수리등의 이름풀이가 아니라 성명자 본인이 더 잘 파악할 수 있다고 생각합니다.  <br><br>3. 문의나 오류 사항은 어디로 질문하나요?<br><br>질문하실 사항이나 건의 사항은 cs119@usoosoft.com 으로 연락주세요. 리뷰를 통한 문의 사항은 개발자 측에 실시간으로 전달되지 않고 또한 메일을 통한 Feedback을 드릴 수가 없어 답신이 늦을 수 있습니다. <br><br>넴유베를 활용하셔서 예쁘고 마음에 드시는 이름들을 많이 만드시길 "com.OneLife2Care.BabiesColicHelp"	"Colic in Babies & infantile colic Treatment Help"	"100"	"0"	"<div jsname=""sngebd"">In this, Help &amp; Home Remedies For Colic in Babies app, we have compiled information about baby colic, its causes, symptoms, diagnosis and treatment. This app is really useful for new parrnts and helps them to learn baby crying behavior.<br><br>Baby colic, also known as infantile colic, is not a disease but a combination of baffling behaviors. It typically does not result in long term problems<br>Doctors diagnose an infant's colic on basis of ""rules of three for Your baby's crying"":<br><br>•baby's crying Lasts at least three hours at a stretch<br>•crying Occurs at least three days a week<br>•crying Persists for at least three weeks in a row<br><br>colic signs and symptoms could be:-<br>•Crying occurs at the same time every day (usually in the late afternoon or early evening, but it can vary).<br>•Crying seems to occur for no reason (not because baby has a dirty diaper or is hungry or tired).<br>•Baby may pull up his legs, clench his fists and generally move his legs and arms more.<br>•He also often will close his eyes or open them very wide, furrow his brow, even hold his breath briefly.<br>•Bowel activity may increase, and he may pass gas or spit up.<br>•Eating and sleeping are disrupted by the crying — baby frantically seeks a nipple only to reject it once sucking has begun, or dozes for a few moments only to wake up screaming.<br><br>Causes of colic could be:- An infant's immature digestive system, acid reflux, Food allergies or sensitivity, environmental disturbances etc.<br><br>Infant with Colic may affect family stability and be a cause of short-term anxiety or depression in the father and mother. It may also contribute to exhaustion and stress in the parents especially mothers.</div>"	"0.00"	"Parenting"	"0"

It's very common in Infants and older children to get diarrhea. Diarrhea actually is the body's way of ridding itself of germs, and often followed with fever, nausea, vomiting, cramps, and dehydration.<br><br>Some of the most common reasons that may cause Severe diarrhea in kids can be:- <br>• Too much fruit or fruit juice<br>• Use of antibiotics &amp; laxatives or other medications <br>• Allergies or sensitivities to particular foods (celiac disease and lactose intolerance)<br>• Dietary changes (in baby or breastfeeding mother)<br>• Inflammatory bowel disease (IBD)<br>• Bacterial infections <br>• Viral infections<br>• Parasites<br>• Malnutrition<br>• Improper food preparation or food poisoning<br>• Poor hygiene<br><br>In this, Infant Diarrhea &amp; stomach infection in kids help app, we have compiled complete information related to causes, symptoms, prevention, treatment and home remedies for diarrhea and dehydration in children and infants.</div>"	"0.00"	"Parenting"	"7"
"com.OneLife2Care.BabiesEarInfectionHelp"	"Baby Ear Pain Help for Ear Infection in Children"	"500"	"4.3"	"<div jsname=""sngebd"">Ear infection is a most common problem that occurs mostly in young children and babies. Ear infection occurs when fluid gets trapped in the middle ear and becomes infected by bacteria or a virus. This is most likely to happen when the Eustachian tube, which is a narrow passage way that connects the throat to the middle ear,  gets blocked. This blockage is caused by swelling or congestion from a cold, which is why an ear infection often develops on the heels of a cold. Allergies can also cause inflammation that obstructs the Eustachian tubes. But most commonly earr infections tend to strike after a common cold or sinus infection.<br><br>Symptoms of ear infection and pain could be:-<br>* Reduced appetite<br>* Unpleasant smell<br>* Complaining of ear pain or hearing loss<br>* Sudden increase in fussiness during a cold<br>* Fussiness during the day or night<br>* Yellow or whitish fluid draining from the ear<br>* Your baby pulls, grabs, or tugs at his ears<br>* Difficulty sleeping<br><br><br>In this, Ear Infection In Babies Ear Pain in children Help app we have compiled information on causes, symptoms, diagnosis, prevention and treatment of ear infections in children an small babies. One should  avoid over-the-counter ear drops unless the doctor recommends them, as they can cause permanent damage if your child's eardrum is perforated.</div>"	"0.00"	"Parenting"	"3"
"com.OneLife2Care.BabyAcidReflux"	"Help for Baby Acid Reflux & GER in Infants"	"100"	"4"	"<div jsname=""sngebd"">It's perfectly normal for babies to spit up after feedings or even to vomit once in a while. Acid reflux, also known as gastroesophageal reflux (GER) is the backing up of stomach contents into the throat. An infant with GER will spit up frequently or vomit.<br>some babies spit up quite frequently and show no ill effects but if your infant has those symptoms plus irritability, feeding difficulties, inadequate weight gain, coughing, choking, or wheezing after feeding, it may be a sign of a more serious condition known as GERD (gastroesophageal reflux disease). GERD is a complication of GER. In infants, GER is much more common than GERD.<br><br>If you feed baby with bottle then keep the nipple filled with milk throughout feedings to avoid air gulping. Try a variety of nipples, avoid the ones with larger holes that can cause milk to flow too fast.<br>Whether you bottle feed or breastfeed, make sure to frequently burp your baby. Burping your infant during a feeding may help with reflux symptoms.It is important to receive the proper diagnosis in order to get the best treatment for your baby.<br><br>In this, Help for Baby Acid Reflux &amp; GER in Infants, app we have compiled complete information releted to problems, causes, symptoms, prevention, treatment and home remedies related to Baby Acid Reflux or GER.</div>"	"0.00"	"Parenting"	"1"

These bumps quickly change into clear, fluid-filled blisters on a pink base, which eventually become dry brown crusts.<br>If your baby has been exposed to the chicken pox, it usually takes 14 to 16 days for the pustules to appear, although they can show up anytime between ten and 21 days.<br>Children with chicken pox can pass the virus by touching someone or coughing or sneezing onto their hand, or by releasing it into the air whenever they sneeze, cough, or even breathe. <br>The virus can also spread from direct contact with the fluid from the blisters before they crust over.<br>Chickenpox usually starts with mild flu but other symptoms could be:-<br>•Fever<br>•Headache<br>•Nausea<br>•Aches and pains<br>•Loss of appetite<br><br>This, Chicken Pox In Babies Causes Treatment Help app, contains complete information of causes, symptoms, treatment, prevention and home remedies for the chicken pox, that usually occurs in children and toddlers.<br>Chickenpox is caused by a virus, so won’t respond to antibiotics. It can be caused by allergies or a bacterial or viral infection. Sometimes newborn Eye drops given at birth to prevent bacterial infection can irritate a newborn's eyes. "com.orgellullaby.choi.netflyus"	"●Orgel Music Lullaby - Prenatal Lullabies"	"100"	"0"	"<div jsname=""sngebd"">●Baby Songs To Go To Sleep<br><br>Some babies fall asleep at the drop of a hat, whilst others seem to struggle to settle down for their sleeps and all sleep deprived parents of young babies long to have babies that sleep easily and wake refresh and in a good mood. Luckily, this can be achieved by introducing a pre sleep routine that incorporates baby songs to get to sleep.<br>Whilst all babies like to sleep and it is something that they spend much of their time doing in the early months, sadly, most babies find the transition from being awake to falling asleep difficult some times and particularly around the four month point as they alter their sleep patterns to sleeping much more at night and having just one nap in the morning and one in the afternoon.<br>Babies as young as six weeks are clever enough to understand a pre-sleep routine so it is well worth getting one established by this age and to consider incorporating baby song to go to sleep. Traditional lullabies ( sometimes called ‘cradle songs’) have worked well in aiding babies to relax and fall asleep and medical studies have shown that babies often sleep more soundly if they have been sung a lullaby as they will have dozed off happy and relaxed rather than stressed and agitated as they have had difficulties settling and have become over tired.<br><br>It is well worth thinking about sleep routines both for day time sleeps and at bedtime. There needs to be a distinct change in tempo as babies are easily excited and stimulated by everyday family life. True, babies will often fall asleep on a car journey or family walk where they are lulled by the car engine or buggy, but when they are at home, it is best to move them to the nursery as they show signs of tiredness. Close the curtains so that the light is dim and place them in their bed as you sing to them and very soon your baby will fall asleep – but continue singing  for a few minutes as an abrupt ending could cause your baby to wake again!<br>The difference between day and night is something young babies do not know, so it is well worth thinking about your baby’s bedtime routine. Specialists say that the routine should last no more than 30 minutes and than a warm bath followed by nappy change and nightclothes is beneficial. A bedtime feed should follow and as baby looks tired you can gently start singing your baby songs to go to sleep, settling him in his cot before he actually falls asleep.<br>An important consideration about the bedtime routine is lighting in the nursery.  Whilst you will need a little light to see what you are doing and for night time feeds, bright lights will be like sunshine to your baby and will stimulate him to stay wide awake and play – groan!<br>Far better to use a dimmer switch on your light or a soft night light as this will help your baby to relax after his feed and with the help of your lullabies, drift off to sleep soon….and the big bonus is that you will be able to do the same! .<br><br>[Menu Introduction]<br>▶Touch and play music<br>You can choose prenatal music among various genre by simply touching the play button.<br><br>▶Play the entire song once. <br>It is a functionthat plays the music once from the specified location to the end of the list. <br><br>▶Infinitely play the entire song. <br>It is a function that plays repeatedly on the specified location. <br><br>▶Timer<br>You can select the time to automatically close the app.</div>"	"0.00"	"Parenting"	"0"

"com.rbjmobileapp.pregnancy"	"Pregnancy"	"100"	"5"	"<div jsname=""sngebd"">Pregnancy, also known as gestation, is the time during which one or more offspring develops inside a woman. A multiple pregnancy involves more than one offspring, such as with twins. Pregnancy can occur by sexual intercourse or assisted reproductive technology. Childbirth typically occurs around 40 weeks from the last menstrual period (LMP). This is just over nine months, where each month averages 29½ days. When measured from fertilisation it is about 38 weeks. An embryo is the developing offspring during the first eight weeks following fertilisation, after which, the term fetus is used until birth. Symptoms of early pregnancy may include missed periods, tender breasts, nausea and vomiting, hunger, and frequent urination. Pregnancy may be confirmed with a pregnancy test.<br><br>Pregnancy is typically divided into three trimesters. The first trimester is from week one through 12 and includes conception, which is when the sperm fertilizes the egg. The fertilized egg then travels down the fallopian tube and attaches to the inside of the uterus, where it begins to form the embryo and placenta. During the first trimester, the possibility of miscarriage (natural death of embryo or fetus) is at its highest. The second trimester is from week 13 through 28. Around the middle of the second trimester, movement of the fetus may be felt. At 28 weeks, more than 90% of babies can survive outside of the uterus if provided with high-quality medical care. The third trimester is from 29 weeks through 40 weeks.<br><br>Prenatal care improves pregnancy outcomes. Prenatal care may include taking extra folic acid, avoiding drugs and alcohol, regular exercise, blood tests, and regular physical examinations. Complications of pregnancy may include disorders of high blood pressure, gestational diabetes, iron-deficiency anemia, and severe nausea and vomiting among others. In the ideal childbirth labor begins on its own when a woman is ""at term"". Pregnancy is considered at full term when gestation has lasted 39 to 41 weeks. After 41 weeks, it is known as late term and after 42 weeks post term. Babies born before 39 weeks are considered early term while those before 37 weeks are preterm. Preterm babies are at higher risk of health problems such as cerebral palsy. The baby is probably too tired, but at the same time unable to fall asleep by itself. This is a common situation of newborns.<br><br>What is white noise exactly?<br><br>It’s helpful to look at the name itself to start with. White noise gets its name from ‘white light’. In simple terms, white light is all colors, or frequencies of color, combined together.<br><br>In a similar way, white noise is a combination of all the different frequencies of sound the human ear can hear.<br><br>The white noise we talk about usually isn’t every possible sound put together though. White noise is the signal, or frequency, created when all the different frequencies of audible sound that the human ear and brain can perceive are put together at a similar level.<br><br>Why Babies Love White Noise?<br><br>Let’s start with looking at it from baby’s perspective.They spend their lives in a very noisy womb. Life outside the womb is uncomfortably quiet for baby. White noise sounds like “home” to a baby and your baby sleep in seconds with these noises.White noise is not unlike the instinctive ‘shhhush’-ing sound parents make when trying to comfort or quieten their child. It masks any sounds which might otherwise startle the infant. Babies have sensitive hearing so it’s best to keep the volume to a conversation level.<br><br><br>Baby sleep music app can also be used by adults suffering with insomnia or sleep disorders.App have relaxing sounds , baby sleep sounds and lullabies.<br><br>Colic baby, Baby sleeper, Baby sleep sounds, Baby sleep instant<br><br>baby sleep<br>baby sleep sounds<br>baby sleeping sounds<br>child music<br>kids music<br>bedtime sounds<br>relaxing sounds<br>baby shusher<br>white sounds</div>"	"0.00"	"Parenting"	"356"

Kehamilan memang menjadi saat yang membahagiakan sekaligus menegangkan. Mengapa menegangkan? Umumnya karena kecemasan  Mums mengenai apa yang sebaiknya dilakukan untuk mendapatkan kehamilan yang berkualitas, sehingga si Kecil tumbuh sehat. <br><br>Belum lagi ketakutan yang biasanya mengintai selama hamil, seperti apakah si Kecil sempurna? Teman Bumil memiliki beragam fitur andalan yang menarik sekaligus bermanfaat. <br><br>1.	Checklist<br><br>Mums kebingungan apa saja yang harus dilakukan selama hamil? Ya, beberapa Mums mengeluh menjadi lebih pelupa selama hamil. Beberapa literatur menyebutkan, perubahan hormon adalah penyebabnya. Nah, fitur Agenda di Teman Bumil, bisa menjadi solusi permasalahan ini. Mums tinggal menginput to do list per hari. Teman Bumil akan menjadi asisten pribadi yang akan mengirimkan reminder untuk Mums. <br><br>3.	Janin 360<br><br>Yuk, semakin dekat dengan buah hati Mums di dalam kandungan! Record Mum&amp;Janin<br><br>Pantau terus perkembangan janin dan kesehatan Mums di fitur ini. Setiap kali selesai konsultasi ke dokter, masukkan data berat dan panjang janin, serta detak jantungnya. Mums akan melihat grafiknya tiap bulan. Mums juga bisa memantau kondisi Mums sendiri. Masukkan tekanan darah dan kenaikan berat badan Mums. Data ini juga bisa Mums tunjukkan setiap kali kunjungan rutin ke dokter. <br><br>5.	Album<br><br>Kehamilan menjadi  momen yang tidak terlupakan. Karenanya, simpan semua foto dan kenangan (termasuk foto USG Mums) ke dalam album ini. Nantinya, Mums bisa tunjukkan pada si Kecil, betapa menyenangkan masa mengandungnya selama 9 bulan. <br><br>6.	Artikel<br><br>Temukan beragam informasi tepercaya dan menarik selama kehamilan di fitur ini! <br><br>7.	Tips<br><br>Mums butuh tips sederhana namun tetap penting? "com.zdp72.audio.book.fairy.tales.rus1"	"Аудио сказки для детей"	"1000000"	"4.5"	"<div jsname=""sngebd"">Аудио книга включает в себя сборник русских народных сказок. Жемчужины русского, украинского, казахского и белорусского фольклора.<br><br>Великолепный сборник лучших детских сказок, рассказанных талантливой актрисой откроет вам необычайный и многообразный мир чудес и волшебства, познакомит с добрыми и отзывчивыми героями и их антиподами, а также ненавязчиво научит жизненной мудрости. Эти сказки, несомненно, займут одно из первых мест в вашей домашней коллекции. <br><br>Содержание:<br><br>- Маша и медведь<br>- Волк и семеро козлят<br>- Пузырь, соломинка и лапоть<br>- Лисичка со скалочкой<br>- Зайка и лиска<br>- Умная внучка<br>- Лиса и дрозд<br>- Курочка Ряба<br><br>Сказка — жанр литературного творчества:<br><br>Сказка фольклорная — эпический жанр письменного и устного народного творчества: прозаический устный рассказ о вымышленных событиях в фольклоре разных народов. Вид повествовательного, в основном, прозаического фольклора (сказочная проза), включающий в себя разножанровые произведения, тексты которых опираются на вымысел. Сказочный фольклор противостоит «достоверному» фольклорному повествованию (несказочная проза) (см. миф, былина, историческая песня, духовные стихи, легенда, демонологические рассказы, сказ, предание, быличка).<br><br>Сказка литературная — эпический жанр: ориентированное на вымысел произведение, тесно связанное с народной сказкой, но, в отличие от нее, принадлежащее конкретному автору, не бытовавшее до публикации в устной форме и не имевшее вариантов. Литературная сказка либо подражает фольклорной (литературная сказка, написанная в народнопоэтическом стиле), либо создаёт дидактическое произведение (см. дидактическая литература) на основе нефольклорных сюжетов. Фольклорная сказка исторически предшествует литературной.<br><br>Свойства сборника для Android <br><br>- колыбельные сказки для малышей<br>- помощник родителям, бабушкам и дедушкам в убаюкивании детей<br>- аудиосказка развивает воображение ребенка<br>- помогает детям в познании мира через сказку<br>- помогает малышам в изучении новых слов русского языка<br>- аудио книга учит малюток доброте и справедливости<br>- усыпляет не только детей но и взрослых<br>- колыбельные для детей<br>- сказки Андерсена, братьев Гримм, Толстого, Пушкина<br>- сборник сказок для детей ауди<br>- сказки на ночь бесплатно<br>- сказки русских писателей<br>- аудио стихи Корнея Чуковского<br>- Аудио басни Крылова на русском офлайн<br>- Детские песни советских времен <br>- Аудио сказки с картинками<br>- Аудио сказки Шарля Перро<br>- Песни для детей<br>- Песни из мультфильмов детские<br><br><br>Аудиокнига — художественное или познавательное произведение, обычно начитанное человеком (например, профессиональным актёром) или их группой и записанное на любой звуковой носитель. Детский писатель, художник-иллюстратор и режиссёр-мультипликатор.<br><br>Владимир Сутеев написал множество сказок, которые отличаются живостью, остроумием, простотой и доступностью для самых маленьких читателей. Почти каждое предложение сопровождалось яркой иллюстрацией, в которые Сутеев много привнёс из мультипликации: его динамичные рисунки похожи на кадры мультфильмов; персонажи имеют графическую индивидуальность, выраженную в облике, движениях, мимике. В его книгах всегда много юмора, помогающего без морализации объяснить детям простые истины.<br><br>С 1947 года работал в Детгизе. Иллюстрировал множество детских сказок советских писателей: Чуковского, Маршака, Михалкова. Впервые с иллюстрациями художника на русском языке вышли книги: Д. Родари «Приключения Чиполлино» (сутеевские персонажи этой сказки стали образцом для детских игрушек), норвежского писателя А. Прейсена «Веселый Новый год», венгерского писателя Агнеш Балинт «Гном Гномыч и Изюмка», английского писателя Л. Муура «Крошка Енот и тот, кто сидит в пруду». А в 1952 году вышла первая книжка за авторством Сутеева, «Две сказки про карандаш и краски». Чуковский приветствовал её появление рецензией в «Литературной газете».<br>книга оформленная В. Г. Сутеевым Иллюстрации Владимира Григорьевича Сутеева часто используются для оформления детских садов, детских лечебных учреждений, столовых, магазинов, детских уголков и т. д. The numbers 1 to 10 can be expressed in Roman numerals as follows:<br>I, II, III, IV, V, VI, VII, VIII, IX, X.<br><br>The Roman numeral system is a cousin of Etruscan numerals. Use of Roman numerals continued after the decline of the Roman Empire. From the 14th century on, Roman numerals began to be replaced in most contexts by more convenient Hindu-Arabic numerals; however this process was gradual, and the use of Roman numerals in some minor applications continues to this day.<br><br>Each flash card is highly illustrated and an animated picture flashes up with the associated number and sound. Alphabet and numbers flash cards help children develop memory and listening skills. Children will get to know phonics and be able to connect letter sounds with objects, for example: A is for Apple.<br><br>A number is a mathematical object used to count, label, and measure. In mathematics, the definition of number has been extended over the years to include such numbers as zero, negative numbers, rational numbers, irrational numbers, and complex numbers.<br><br>Counting is the action of finding the number of elements of a finite set of objects. The traditional way of counting consists of continually increasing a (mental or spoken) counter by a unit for every element of the set, in some order, while marking (or displacing) those elements to avoid visiting the same element more than once, until no unmarked elements are left; if the counter was set to one after the first object, the value after visiting the final object gives the desired number of elements. The related term enumeration refers to uniquely identifying the elements of a finite (combinatorial) set or infinite set by assigning a number to each element.</div>"	"0.00"	"Parenting"	"45"

Dabei werden spielerisch auch Rollen ausprobiert, Erfahrungen verarbeitet und Möglichkeiten erkundet – wichtige Fähigkeiten, um seelisch zu wachsen und sich zu entwickeln.<br><br>Phantasiereisen können Kinder auf viele Weisen bei dieser Entwicklung unterstützen, indem sie…<br><br>- Selbstwertgefühl und Selbstbewusstsein stärken; <br>- Entspannung und Erholung schenken; <br>- die Körperwahrnehmung schulen und Freude an Bewegung und Aktivitäten vermitteln; <br>- zum kreativen Spielen, zum Malen und Basteln anregen; <br>- Akzeptanz und Geborgenheit vermitteln; <br>- die soziale Kompetenz der Kinder fördern, fürsorglich und rücksichtsvoll miteinander umzugehen; <br>- spielerisch und angstfrei mit Themen wie Verantwortung, Freundschaft, Herausforderungen oder Konflikte erleben lassen; <br>- Lust auf geselliges Miteinander, auf Kontakte und Freundschaften machen und die Bereitschaft erhöhen, auf andere zuzugehen.<br><br>Die Gute-Nacht-Geschichten spielen auf Sanjada: einer Welt, „in der die Welt noch in Ordnung ist“.
